name: LÖVE Test for Linux via Itch.io App
name_original: LÖVE Test for Linux via Itch.io App
description:
LÖVE Test for Linux via Itch.io App is a game developed by josefnpat. It came out on 04-06-2016.
LÖVE Test for Linux via Itch.io App is available on Linux. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
